dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] remove this link immediately]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: ze frank [mailto:ze@zefrank.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 20, 2006 3:11 PM
To: Legal Response
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org; paul@phillipsdata.com
Subject: Re: [Fwd: [ABUSE] remove this link immediately]

what do you need me to do?

one of your customers is ripping me off...they took my actual file...an
entire game that I created more than 2 years ago... without my permission,
they stole the actual thing, (not a home made replica, the actual thing) and
are hosting it on their site. furthermore it still makes calls to my
database to get high scores.

this is not a fuzzy issue.

if a simple request won't elicit more than a formal response, then, let me
know to whom I should refer my lawyer.

ze
http://www.zefrank.com







On 3/20/06 3:38 PM, "Legal Response" <legal-response2@theplanet.com> wrote:

>  To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does 
> not substantially comply with the required notification elements of 
> the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
> 
> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.
> 
> Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
>  
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
> 
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf 
> Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
> Sent: Sunday, March 19, 2006 7:42 PM
> To: ze@zefrank.com; copyright@theplanet.com
> Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] remove this link immediately]
> 
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
> 
> Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, 
> at the address of copyright@theplanet.com.
> 
> - -------- Original Message --------
> Subject: [ABUSE] remove this link immediately
> Date: Sun, 19 Mar 2006 11:34:27 -0500
> From: zefrank <ze@zefrank.com>
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> 
> the Planet,
> 
> It has come to my attention that the game on 
> http://www.funflashgames.com/spaceshipracinggame.htm was taken from my 
> site at http://www.zefrank.com/racinggame/index.html.
> 
> The content is being hosted on your servers without my permission and 
> is in violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.
> 
> I hereby request that you remove this content immediately.
> 
> If you have any questions please feel free to contact me
> 
> ze frank
> 917 531 1025
> 
> 
> 
> 
> - --
> Thanks,
> 
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
